#summary Using HeeksCNC

= It's still in an early stage =
It will have tool bar buttons soon, on the Program window, which help you do the following

= An example =
Use the HeeksCAD line/arc drawing button to draw some lines.

Then copy the following text to the Program window:

tool(1, 2, 0)

spindle(1000)

rate(100, 100)

rapid(0, 0, 0)

rapid(10, 0, 0)

profile(1, 'left', 10, 10)



Then press the "Run Program" icon at the edge of the Program window.
You should see some profiling tool path.
